name: Silliman University
president: Dr. Ben S. Malayang III    B.A., M.A., Ph.D.  (Ohio University and University of California, Berkeley) http://www.su.edu.ph/netnews/v12/v12n2.html#malayang "Dr. Ben Malayang III is new Silliman president". SU Net News. Retrieved 2009-10-16.
students: 8,630 http://beta.su.edu.ph/article/318-2nd-Sem-Enrollment-H "2nd Sem Enrollment Higher than SY 10-11". SU NetNews. Retrieved 2011-11-22.
campus: Urban,  33 hectares 81.84 acres (Hibbard Avenue main campus), 29 hectares 71.66 acres (College of Agriculture and Marine Lab campus), 465 hectares 1,149.04 acres (Ticao Island Facility)
affiliations: ACUCA, http://www.unitedboard.org/ UBCHEA, http://www.acscu.org/ ACSCU, ASAIHL, PAASCU, ATESEA, UCCP among others
